A frontend application with a user interface for composing emails
A frontend feature allowing users to select recipients from a list or input manually
A frontend form for attaching files to emails before sending
A frontend section for managing sent emails including viewing and tracking status
A frontend module for creating, saving, and selecting email templates
A frontend recipient management system allowing users to add, edit, and remove contacts
A backend API for handling email composition data submitted from the frontend
A backend service for connecting to an external PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables
A backend endpoint for sending emails through an email service provider
A backend module for storing and retrieving email templates from the database
A backend feature for uploading and associating file attachments with emails
A backend recipient management system with CRUD operations for contact data
A backend logging mechanism to track sent emails and their statuses
A package.json configuration enabling `npm run install:all` to install frontend and backend dependencies
A package.json script for `npm run dev` to start both frontend and backend servers concurrently
